radiographic_examinations.findings: Three right adrenal nodules (22 mm, 18 mm, and 4 mm in maximum diameter) and a 7-35 mm left adrenal nodule, all with an unenhanced attenuation of <10 Hounsfield units and exhibiting >70% washout of contrast 15 minutes after administration.
Growth in the largest of the three right adrenal nodules (31 mm from 22 mm in maximum diameter) and stability in the other right- and left-sided nodules.
